user.title: Connect to ClickUp
user.description: Set up ClickUp Worklog integration to track your time entries. You will need your ClickUp API token and Workspace ID.

data.user_id: User ID (Optional - leave empty to use authenticated user)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to ClickUp API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication. Please check your API token and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.

abort.already_configured: This ClickUp Workspace is already configured.
